mapper.select: select user_id, comm_reply_seq, comm_reply_content, to_char(comm_reply_writen_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as comm_reply_writen_date from community_reply where comm_seq= #{comm_seq} and depth=0 order by comm_reply_writen_date asc

select user_id, comm_reply_seq, comm_reply_content, refer, to_char(comm_reply_writen_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')as comm_reply_writen_date from community_reply where comm_seq= #{comm_seq} and depth=1 order by comm_reply_writen_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into community_reply(comm_reply_seq, comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_content, comm_reply_writen_date, step, refer, depth) values (comm_reply_seq.nextval,#{comm_seq},#{user_id},#{comm_reply_content},sysdate,0,#{comm_seq},0)

insert into community_reply(comm_reply_seq, comm_seq, user_id, comm_reply_content, comm_reply_writen_date, step, refer, depth) values (comm_reply_seq.nextval,#{comm_seq},#{user_id},#{comm_reply_content},sysdate,0,#{comm_reply_seq},1)
